title: My Job
description: Emma talks about her job and daily work routine.
speaker: Emma
text: Today, I want to talk about my job.
I work in a small office.
Every day, I arrive at work at nine o’clock.
I answer phone calls and talk to people.
I help customers and write emails.
I like my job very much.
In the afternoon, I take a short break.
At five o’clock, I finish work and go home.
My job is simple, but I enjoy it.

questions.q: What time does Emma arrive at work?
What does Emma do in the afternoon?
